 class LayerNormTest(test.TestCase):
body:
This will make the tests substantially more expensive to run (3x the cost they have now).

I think it's best to triplicate a single representative test to cover all dtypes, and assume that because there's no dtype-specific code in the layers this is enough coverage.

What do you think?
